original_title: Laverne & Shirley XXX: A Dreamzone Parody
overview: Laverne & Shirley are two all American girls from Milwaukee, doin' it their way. They're trying to make their dreams come true. But when their landlord, Mrs. Babish, is looking for the rent, reality sets in. But with the help of horny neighbors like Lenny & Squiggy, Laverne's crazy dad and Shirley's boyfriend (The Big Ragoo), there's no stopping them.
title: Laverne & Shirley XXX: A Dreamzone Parody
